title: Font viewing tool
content:
Maybe it's the wrong topic - but I'm looking for a Mac-tool, that displays me font's without loading them into the system-cache. I used to take Font Gander but this program doesn't support OSX. Can somebody help me?   
   
Sorry for my bad english.
author: nike

comments.content: Romesh -- Off the top of my head, I can't think of the name, but I'm sure you can find something at [VersionTracker](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023140605/http:/versiontracker.com/) or [CNETs Downloads](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023140605/http:/downloads.com/)

try this:   
   
 [http://www.vizspring.com/products/typeset/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023140605/http:/www.vizspring.com/products/typeset/)   
   
Works in OSx. Lets you preview unloaded fonts. There's a trial version you can download. The progmmer calls it "iTunes for your fonts"   
   
~ R!

thx tiffany and roballoo.   
typesets works perfectly.   
I just have to explore versiontracker and cnet.
